kitsunemod:LightPower.NAME: Light
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, consume this to get
x your Light in block if you're over

kitsunemod:DarkPower.NAME: Dark
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, consume this to deal
x your Dark in damage to a random enemy if you're over

kitsunemod:KitsuneShapePower.NAME: Kitsune Shape
DESCRIPTIONS: Currently in the form of a Kitsune. Kitsune Aspect will trigger, and you have minor stat bonuses.

kitsunemod:FoxShapePower.NAME: Fox Shape
DESCRIPTIONS: Currently in the form of a Fox. Fox Aspect will trigger, and you have less Strength but more Dexterity.

kitsunemod:HumanShapePower.NAME: Human Shape
DESCRIPTIONS: Currently in the form of a Human. Human Aspect will trigger, and you have less Dexterity but more Strength.

kitsunemod:NinetailedShapePower.NAME: Ninetailed Shape
DESCRIPTIONS: Currently in a Kitsune's true form. All Aspects will trigger, and you have significant increased Strength/Dex.
